title: Bug 110566 - Wrong data set result returned when an invalid filter expression 'row[0]' is set
description: When a filter like 'row[0] equals to 0' is set, the data set returns an incorrect result or null result set.
OB: The first result record is returned when previewing the data set after setting the filter 'row[0] equals to'.
EB: After setting the filter 'row[0] equals to', no result records should be returned.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Set a filter in the data set with 'row[0] equals to' 
2. Click on the Preview tab and observe the result.
